heading: HR00425
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENVIRONMENT OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT A REVIEW, PURSUANT TO THE OVERSIGHT FUNCTION OF CONGRESS, AND IN AID OF LEGISLATION, OF THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE ECOLOGICAL SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT ACT OF 2000 BY THE NATIONAL SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT COMMISSION TO DETERMINE THE EXTENT OF ITS COMPLIANCE WITH THE INTENT AND SPIRIT OF THE LAW PARTICULARLY THE STATED POLICIES THEREIN, TO IDENTIFY THE CONSTRAINTS AND CHALLENGES FACED IN ENFORCING THE PROVISIONS OF THE LAW AND PROPOSING INPUTS FOR AMENDMENTS, IF NEEDED, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on ECOLOGY since 2019-10-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00425
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENVIRONMENT OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT A REVIEW, PURSUANT TO THE OVERSIGHT FUNCTION OF CONGRESS, AND IN AID OF LEGISLATION, OF THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE ECOLOGICAL SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT ACT OF 2000 BY THE NATIONAL SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT COMMISSION TO DETERMINE THE EXTENT OF ITS COMPLIANCE WITH THE INTENT AND SPIRIT OF THE LAW PARTICULARLY THE STATED POLICIES THEREIN, TO IDENTIFY THE CONSTRAINTS AND CHALLENGES FACED IN ENFORCING THE PROVISIONS OF THE LAW AND PROPOSING INPUTS FOR AMENDMENTS, IF NEEDED, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ANTONIO, MICHELLE M.
DATE FILED : 2016-10-03
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ECOLOGY ON 2019-10-19
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-10-10;
